comment.body: well, shit happens.. nice to see you come out on top. ;)
I prefer Gimp any day over Photoshop.. it takes a bit to get used to but are pretty much as capable when you do. However if Photoshop is a must then it works via Wine.

Have had the same thought... It would let Zeronet integrate a lot better and also be more inviting for non-technical users. It is probably in the future unless the conventional browser picks it up. It seems rational to me. It might be possible to get a less known alternative like Midori or Qutebrowser to do so... but it is a lot of work for a pretty nominal user base at the moment.
@Nofish: It could have worked.. but tab will select the nearest link and then enter will open that link.
